events.name: Google I/O Extended by GDG Chennai
events.description:
Google I/O is an annual developer festival held at the outdoor Shoreline Amphitheatre.

Last year, GDG Chennai hosted I/O Extended successfully for over 200 people in Chennai. This year, GDG Chennai is hosting a I/O Extended event with a variety of activities for developers in our state. These includes live demos, workshops, magic and other exciting tech stuff we've never done before.

Register Here :¬†https://goo.gl/forms/XSDYIZYyrSs4M2792

Agenda:

1400 - 1430 IST: Registration & Networking

1430 - 1500 IST: Keynote Presentation

1500 - 1545 IST: Introduction to Android O by Somasundaram

1545 - 1600 IST: Networking Break

1600 - 1645 IST: Using Firebase for your application by Muthu Ramakrishnan (Google Inc.)

1645 - 1800 IST: Networking Event

Notes:¬†

- This event is Invite Only.

- Please display your email invite at the venue to attend the event.

- We are having stalls with some really cool merchandise about Chennai. The merchandise would be paid, if you are interested, we request you to bring some money for you to purchase.

events.description:

‚Ä¢ What we'll do
GDG Chennai's annual International Women's Day event is coming around the corner! This year we want to focus on sharing entrepreneurial stories, lifestyle talks and technical workshops - all inspired by women around us.

This event is only for women. The event is in Satyam Cinemas complex at Blur Cafe. Lunch will be provided to all who have registered via the Google Form.

events.name: GDG Chennai - Hackfest Hackathon
events.description:
GDG Chennai is geared up to host one of the much awaited Hackathon of Chennai.

- Students and Working professionals are invited for the event.
- Food, Accommodation and Transportation from major stops from Chennai city will be provided.
- Problem statement to work on will be provided in the event.
- Hackathon Theme will be "Build for Social Cause"

Registration -
http://hack-fest.tech

Timings -

6th October 2018
- Buses Arrival by 9 AM to ITM Business School
- Hackathon Inauguration will start from morning 10AM
- Hackathon Time starts by Afternoon - 12 PM

7th October 2018
- Hackathon time stops by Afternoon - 12 PM
- Results declaration by 2PM
- Buses departure by 3 PM

Rules -

1. A Team of Minimum Two members and Maximum Five is allowed to take part.
2. College Students need to upload their valid Scanned ID cards
3. All the further communication will be done via registered mobile Number

*Hackathon Organisers have the right for any changes in the timing, and event flow.

In case of Any Queries, Please Contact -

Saikiran Sondarkar - [masked]
Harshraj Solanki - [masked]

The name and photo associated with your Google account will be recorded when you upload files and submit this form. Not [masked]? Switch account

events.name: Google's Flutter Study Jam - Chennai
events.description:
Google's Flutter Study Jam Chennai edition presents to you exclusive content for cross-platform mobile application development using Google's Flutter technology.
The series shall help you to build exciting applications for Android and iOS OS together and also help in faster application development.
This will be a from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

Register Link http://bit.ly/2tLXxyF

Speaker: Pawan Kumar https://developers.google.com/experts/people/pawan-kumar

Pre-requisites :
1) Please carry your own fully charged laptop machines.

2) Make sure that you have Android Studio/XCode installed on your computer.
For details on how to download and install IDE, for Android OS visit https://developer.android.com/studio/
After installing, check if a simple 'Hello World' program applications running on your system.

3) Make sure that you have Flutter plugin installed on your IDE. For details on how to download and install Flutter, visit https://flutter.io/get-started/install/.

4) Internet connection.

PS: Entries shall be on invite-only. Please fill this registration form and we will send you an invite. Ensure that you have the set up installed on your machines before you reach for the event.

Note : We have moved the event from March 23 to April 6

events.name: Google IO Extended Chennai
events.description:
Google IO Extended is an annual event by GDG's across the globe which is mainly focusing on bringing the experience of IO happening in San Fransisco to each and every City possible.

This year we're coming up with an interesting agenda of sessions focusing on new things that can help the City's tech crowd to think what they can build next.

It's going to be an invite only event, We'll be sharing the registration form very soon.

Agenda :

02:00-02:30 - Registration

02:30-03:15 ‚Äì What happened at I/O 2019?

03:15-04:30 ‚Äì Understanding Docker & Kubernetes-powered CI/CD with Google Tekton - By Rishabh Singh (https://www.linkedin.com/in/pingrishabh/)

04:30-04:45 ‚Äì Networking Break

04:45-05:30 ‚ÄìDemystifying TensorFlow - By David Raj (https://www.linkedin.com/in/davidrajdaniel/)

05:30-06:15 ‚Äì Building Flutter Apps for Web and Desktop - By Ayush Shekhar (https://www.linkedin.com/in/ayushshekhar/)

events.name: Firebase Roadshow Chennai
events.description:
A Complete Firebase Event with the Official Team in our city.

The engineering team behind Firebase, one of the most popular mobile/web app dev platforms is travelling to India. They will talk about how to do data modelling, crash analysis & prevention, predictions, user rentention/engagement and more by using new features in Firebase.

Spend the day speaking to the team which made these features a reality and sharing feedback. We can't wait to see what you build next!

*It's going to be an invite only event*

Register for event here : https://forms.gle/fGfQs3ijkBhujB6p7

Agenda for event :

9:15 AM - 10 AM : Registration

10 - 10:45 AM : Serverless payment processing with Firebase by Susan Goldblatt & Tina Liang

10:45 - 11:15 AM : UXR for a better product by Benjamin Ferrari-Church

11:30 AM - 12:15 PM : Firestore data modeling by Chris Esplin (GDE)

12:15 PM - 1:00 PM: Using firebase as backend to your flutter by Juhi Singh

1 PM - 2 PM : Q&A and Networking with Lunch !!

events.name: Build Actions for Google Assistant ü§ñ üì± (Workshop) -  Day 1
events.description:
*** READ ALL INSTRUCTION'S CAREFULLY ***
***** REGISTRATION LINK IS IN DESCRIPTION****

This meetup gonna be 2 days workshop on different dates (16th & 23rd Nov) for making chat bots using Dialogflow & Actions on google.
The Day 1 will be helpful in getting started in Dialogflow and Actions on google with hands-on. Day-2 will be Advanced workshop.
Following will be cover during the workshop -

Day 1 - (16th Nov)

- Introduction to Dialogflow
- Introduction to Actions on Google
- Building Actions for google assistant

Day 2 - (23rd Nov)

- Quick overview of Dialogflow & Assistant (Including day 1 topics)
- Create a Webhook using Firebase Cloud Functions
- Deploy it on Telegram and Actions for Google Assistant

Speaker : Somasundaram, Lead Software Engineer, Qube Cinema Tech.

We will make the full-fledged chatbot ! wait... There is more, stay tuned for more announcement.

Day 1 Registration link - https://forms.gle/qHCBLSRS3x9ok1Ri6
Day 2 Registration - will be given after Day 1 workshop.

**Note** - You can directly attend day-2 workshop, if you know basics of Dialogflow & Google assistant.
*THIS IS INVITE ONLY EVENT**
